description.space:
Located in the heart of the romantic zone, Romantic Amapas is a heaven of luxury itself. Romantic Amapas is located in the Romantic Zone in the beautiful old town of Puerto Vallarta . Breathtaking views from the double terrace will provide a life time of memories of spectacular sunsets, rolling waves of the Pacific Ocean and the pristine Los Muertos Beach. The condo offers not only a prime location and magnificent views but has been appointed with only the best that you would expect. Come pamper yourself. High-end finishes and all the amenities you’re looking for in a vacation rental, Romantic Amapas has everything and more.

        Simply the best.
        Just steps away from world-class restaurants and bars, boutiques, the magnificent Los Muertos Beach, the isla rio cuale and its lush vegetation and a 10-minute walk from the famous El Malecon. With all the amenities from home in your very own paradise, Romantic Amapas offers all the luxuries you desire in your vacation. You’ll enjoy an on-site gym plus a roof top pool area with Jacuzzi, barbeque and shaded areas all overlooking the magnificent beach. Inside, your suite includes a large, open living area and gourmet kitchen. A king size bed in the bedroom that looks over the ocean and mountain. Two balconies with Jacuzzi offer amazing views and some of the best sunsets in the world. Rest in air-conditioned comfort while enjoying internet and satelite television. Your stay will be made even easier with weekly maid service included.

        Brand new condo, 1 Bedroom, 2 Baths (sleeps 2)

        Access to Los Muertos beach 1 block away directly in front of Romantic Amapas.
        Short walk from world class restaurants and bars, boutiques, beach, and a 10 minute walk to the famous El Malecon
description.guest_access:
You’ll enjoy an on-site gym plus a roof top pool area with Jacuzzi, barbeque and shaded areas all overlooking the magnificent beach.
        Guest/private parking
description.interaction: Our concierge department, Mexitravels will be pending of any of your needs.

house_rules.details:
We would like to bring your attention to a few request while you enjoy your stay:

          1. As this is a private home, your respectful use of furnishings, decor, facilities is truly appreciated. Quiet hours 11 pm-8 am. Max occupancy determined at the time of your reservation. US 50 per night per person will be charge when default on notifying the correct number of parties.

          2. Suntan lotion easily damages furnishings. Please keep this on mind when sitting down.

          3. This is a NON SMOKING property but you are welcome to do so in the balcony area. Thank you for your respect for future visitors staying after you.

          4. No PETS allowed.

          5. AC is operated with associated remote control in the room. Please don't leave the air conditioning running while not in the condo or in the room or while windows are open. It only takes a few minutes to cool down the room when the air conditioning is turned on. We attempt to keep our rental rates competitive, so your assistance in limiting the use of AC is truly appreciated.

          6. Wi Fi Network provided while checking in.

          7. GARBAGE is to be placed at the white garbage bins located on guest parking space on highway 200 entrance door.

          8. MAID SERVICES provided once per week. If maid services are required more than this, arrangements can be made at an additional price.

          9. ROOF GARDEN use of the infinity pool, Jacuzzi, BBQ, GYM and the rest of amenities are available 8 am-10 pm. Please notice, you are required to keep the area clean after use.

          10. PARKING allowed only at the assigned spot (next to the elevator). We require advanced notice you will use the parking to provide a remote control to operate garage door.

          11. Interphone provided when checking in.

          A second misbehavior warning will result in guest vacating the Premises with no refund.

          Additional information about rental rates
          *Approximate Monthly rates, actual rate will depend on the days of the month you stay

          Enjoy your stay.

cancellation.details: Cancel up to 60 days before check in and get a 50% refund (minus service fees). Cancel within 60 days of your trip and the reservation is non-refundable. Service fees are refunded when cancellation happens before check in and within 48 hours of booking.
